Title: Mad About You
Plot:
Denny puts the whole firm on edge when he unilaterally takes on a high-profile murder case and refuses help from anybody else, especially Alan.

Meanwhile, Jerry and Katie represent a woman whose husband divorced her after being "brainwashed" by an ad campaign from a sleazy lawyer.
GuestStars: Xander Berkeley, Bess Armstrong, Grant Shaud, Valerie Mahaffey, Patrick Fabian, Amy Hill, Jenifer Lewis, Michael C. Mahon, Dean Cudworth, Karen Lew, Ed Brigadier, Marcus Folmar
